title: MAC OSX Mavericks 10.9.2 dmg (from app store)
description:
Hello

I got the full Mavericks from the App Store (final version 10.9.2).

Of course it was in the 'App' format for which I converted the whole thing into a bootable DMG file.

Why did I do it? Well I find DMG to be more convenient than the App folders.

Hope you all enjoy it!

PS: To the best of my knowledge this is legal as Mavericks itself is "Free".

John Abraham
